title: Person of Interest - Shaw Tribute - Everything Burns
author: S. O.
comment: i cried. and it hits me every time i see this last scene... remember its just a show she will be missed dearly. great vid!

I've watched this video many times and...you can't imagine how important it is to me. Really. It is one of those masterpieces that make your heart beats, the perfect tribute to her. Thank you so much!!
The day POI people signed Sarah Shahi to portray Shaw. POI got BETTER!
This loss will hunt me until the day I die.
Shaw is my favorite! Love this tribute! The song is so fitting.
description:
Warning: This video has got spoilers as far as episode 4x11 goes.

"All of this hate
And all of this pain
I'll burn it all down
As my anger reigns
Til everything burns"

Because Shaw was the our badass, awesome, hot, danger girl. And now she's (until further notice) gone. I hope you come back soon. Thank you Sarah Shahi, for your brilliant performance through these seasons. 

"If you wanna day, okay, but die for something that you love." - Sameen Shaw

Song: Everything Burns - Anastacia ft. Ben Moody

No copyright infringement intended.
All clips on this video are from Person of Interest, that belongs to CBS.
